AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cabin Boy
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] joined a pirate crew at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood doing various small jobs around the ship. [PAWN_pronoun] became something of a mascot for the crew.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shipwrecked
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was on a ship that was destroyed in a storm. [PAWN_pronoun] was the only survivor, washing up on a desert island where [PAWN_pronoun] had to fend for [PAWN_objective]self for years before being rescued by a passing pirate ship.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Navy Cadet
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] enlisted in the navy at a young age and received an education as well as combat training.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Escaped Slave
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken from [PAWN_possessive] home and enslaved. When [PAWN_possessive] captors were themselves killed by pirates, [PAWN_pronoun] joined the pirate crew.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate's Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born the bastard child of a pirate captain. [PAWN_possessive] father kept [PAWN_objective] on the ship and spared no expense in [PAWN_possessive] upbringing.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young Treasure Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] found a treasure map as a child and spent [PAWN_possessive] whole childhood trying to find the treasure. [PAWN_pronoun] eventually ran across some pirates and joined them instead.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate Cook
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the only chef onboard [PAWN_possessive] ship. Most of [PAWN_possessive] time was spent cooking for the crew.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate Officer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was among the high ranking officers of [PAWN_possessive] pirate crew, and became accustomed to giving orders.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cursed Pirate
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] came into possession of a great treasure. Unbeknownst to [PAWN_objective] it was cursed, and [PAWN_pronoun] spent many years stuck as an undead before managing to break the curse. This time has had some residual effects on [PAWN_possessive] body and mind.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Treasure Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent years searching for a hidden treasure without success.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Marooned
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was captain of a pirate vessel until being overthrown in a mutiny by [PAWN_possessive] first mate. The crew proceeded to abandon [PAWN_objective] on a desert island, where [PAWN_pronoun] stayed for months until rescue came.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mutineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] led a mutiny against the captain of [PAWN_possessive] crew, taking his place as leader and cruelly leaving him to die.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate Doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as the chief medical expert of a crew of pirates. [PAWN_pronoun] had no formal training and relied primarily on herbal remedies and other folk knowledge.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gentleman Pirate
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was captain of a crew of pirates. [PAWN_pronoun] became well known for [PAWN_possessive] mercy and civility to [PAWN_possessive] foes, as well as [PAWN_possessive] surprising intelligence and craftiness.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shanghaied
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was known for being drunk nearly constantly. This ended up causing [PAWN_objective] trouble when [PAWN_pronoun] was kidnapped by pirates while passed out drunk and forced to join the crew.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Navy Traitor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served in the navy for a few years before deciding the life wasn't for [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] jumped ship at port and joined up with a pirate crew.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hurdy Gurdy Player
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] provided entertainment on the ship by playing the Hurdy Gurdy. Everybody loved [PAWN_objective] and [PAWN_pronoun] rarely had to do any real work around the ship.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Smuggler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] smuggled goods across the ocean. This required a lot of fast talking and fast sailing to avoid arrest.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate Arms Dealer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] built and sold guns and other weapons to various pirate crews. [PAWN_possessive]'s work was considered amongst the best in the sea.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Boarder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] always volunteered to join boarding parties when attacking another ship. [PAWN_pronoun] was a terrifying opponent and the ship's best fighter.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cannoneer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was in charge of manning the cannons on [PAWN_possessive] pirate ship. [PAWN_pronoun] was known as quite the marksman.
